of the locks on the Zero Lab?
common_1090_system_02: You heard the professor... Better press it!

common_1090_friend_02:
You know that book [s;:gs]he told me to bring?
I think it’s got something to do with this place.\c
Or more like...everything to do with this place.[npcn:6]
common_1090_friend_03:
But I’m not the one [s;:gs]he expects to fix whatever
all this is... You are.\c
I think you should be the one to carry it.[npcn:6]
common_1090_friend_04:
[BD06:0]Take care of it for me...
OK, [trnm:0]?[npcn:6]
